name: wrappedjs
description: This package provides wrapped versions of basic JavaScript blocks like switch or try-catch, making them usable in a more inline fashion for flexible usage inside function parameters or chained calls. I created it out of frustration with not being able to use switch inlineâ€”hope it softens your coding experience :).
author: Miguel Rios Marcos <miguel12105marcos@gmail.com> (GitHub: @mriioos, npm: @miguelrios)
